hanzi-su-wiki:
糊

Значения

Клей, крахмал

Мнемоника

Рис 米 и старое 古 костлявое мясо 月 идут на приготовление клея.
purpleculture_pinyin:
hú
muddled; paste; scorched; congee; making a living
запутанный; вставить; опаленный; отвар; зарабатывать на жизнь

hù
paste; cream
вставить; крем
rtega_mnemonic:
糊糊RS䉿䊀煳餬𩰯𩱍 𪍒𪏹𪏻𪐉paste, stick on with paste
  • old body 胡 sticking things in a book with paste made from rice 米
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 餬)
Pictophonetic: 胡 indicates the sound; 米 (grain) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
糊涂 [ hú tu ]: muddled; silly; confused
糊口 [ hú kǒu ]: to scrape a meager living; to get by with difficulty
糊糊 [ hú hu ]: viscous; gooey; sticky; indistinct; thick congee; porridge
养家糊口 [ yǎng jiā hú kǒu ]: to support one's family (idiom); to have difficulty feeding a family
裱糊 [ biǎo hú ]: to wallpaper
糊弄 [ hù nong ]: to fool; to deceive; to go through the motions
面糊 [ miàn hù ]: flour paste
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 米 [ mǐ ] rice, millet, grain
    • 胡 [ hú ] recklessly, foolishly; wildly
heisig_chinese_memo: The uncivilized people recklessly used rice as a batter which they would use to make other things.
Ru_trainchinese:
hū: (глаг) намазывать, штукатурить
hù: (сущ) паста (еда)
hú: (глаг/сущ/прил) клеить; клей, клейстер; жидкая каша (из муки и кукурузы); (о еде) подгоревший (вариант 煳)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: foreign (胡) rice (米) is just paste
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The uncivilized people recklessly used rice as a batter which they would use to make other things.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " m " to " hu " sound. "Said Wen" is made " 𪏻 ", saying: "𪏻, sticky too. From millet, ancient sound. 䊀, (sticky) [𪏻] or from rice." Duan Yucai's note: "Ully made paste." The original meaning is glued. . Such as "Selected Works. Bao Mingyuan's "Wucheng Fu": "To make magnets for imperial rushing, and to paste the earth to fly text." Li Zhouhan's note: "The soil is also terracotta. The walls are decorated with sticky harmony, so Yunfeiwen." Another example is Bai Juyi in the Tang Dynasty. "Bamboo Window": "Open the window without sticking paper, and planting bamboo is not the way to go."

" Paste " also refers to paste. Such as "Qi Min Yao Shu. "Miscellaneous": "Soaking lime in water, after a night, dipping the juice to make the bean paste and making the batter, there will be no insects." Tang Dynasty Feng Zhi's "Miscellaneous Yunxian" volume five cited "Xuanwu Grand Events": "Daily use a bucket for Paste for sealing."

" Paste " also means to satisfy one's hunger with porridge, which means to barely maintain a living, the same as " paste ." Such as "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "Wang Lie": "The ring blocks the gate, the poor alleys are closed, the rice is eaten by the sun, and the sun is eaten, chanting "Poems" and "Books", without changing his music." Tang Dynasty Du Fu "Send a heavy table to Wang Piao's commentary. Nanhai>: "The elders come at the door, and they make ends meet in famine years."

" Paste " means smearing and stuffing. For example, Chapter 40 of "Awakening Marriage" by Xi Zhousheng in the Qing Dynasty: "The east room is very clean, like a snow hole, ready-made beds, ready-made kangs, ten of them are also asleep." Lao She, "Lulu Xiangzi": " Once the car was pulled down, the dust was turned into mud by sweat, and it was glued to the face, showing only three red circles of eyes and mouth."
humanum_short_description_en: From " m " to " hu " sound. The original meaning is bonding.
humanum_full_description:
從「米」，「胡」聲。《說文》作「𪏻」，云：「𪏻，黏也。从黍，古聲。䊀，(黏)[𪏻]或从米。」段玉裁注：「俗作糊。」本義是黏合。如《文選．鮑明遠〈蕪城賦〉》：「制磁石以禦衝，糊頳壤以飛文。」李周翰注：「赬壤，赤土也。以黏和之飾壁，故云飛文。」又如唐代白居易〈竹窗〉：「開窗不糊紙，種竹不依行。」

　　「糊」又指漿糊。如《齊民要術．雜說》：「水浸石灰，經一宿，挹取汁以和豆黏及作麵糊則無蟲。」唐代馮贄《雲仙雜記》卷五引《宣武盛事》：「日用麫一斗為糊，以供緘封。」

　　「糊」也表示以粥充飢，意謂勉強維持生活，同「餬」。如《三國志．魏書．王烈傳》：「環堵篳門，偃息窮巷，飯鬻糊口，并日而食，吟詠《詩》《書》，不改其樂。」唐代杜甫〈送重表姪王砅評事使南海〉：「長者來在門，荒年自糊口。」

　　「糊」表示塗抹、填塞。如清代西周生《醒世姻緣》第40回：「東房裏極乾淨，糊得雪洞似的，現成的床，現成的炕，十個也睡開了。」老舍〈駱駝祥子〉：「一趟車拉下來，灰土被汗合成泥，糊在臉上，只露著眼與嘴三個涷紅了的圈。」

Chinese: The uncivilized people recklessly used rice as a batter which they would use to make other things.
Meaning: batter
Hanzi: 餬
Story: The uncivilized people recklessly used rice as a batter which they would use to make other things.
Kind: both
從「 米 」，「 胡 」聲。《說文》作「 𪏻 」，云：「𪏻，黏也。从黍，古聲。䊀，(黏)[𪏻]或从米。」段玉裁注：「俗作糊。」本義是黏合。如《文選．鮑明遠〈蕪城賦〉》：「制磁石以禦衝，糊頳壤以飛文。」李周翰注：「赬壤，赤土也。以黏和之飾壁，故云飛文。」又如唐代白居易〈竹窗〉：「開窗不糊紙，種竹不依行。」 「 糊 」又指漿糊。如《齊民要術．雜說》：「水浸石灰，經一宿，挹取汁以和豆黏及作麵糊則無蟲。」唐代馮贄《雲仙雜記》卷五引《宣武盛事》：「日用麫一斗為糊，以供緘封。」 「 糊 」也表示以粥充飢，意謂勉強維持生活，同「 餬 」。如《三國志．魏書．王烈傳》：「環堵篳門，偃息窮巷，飯鬻糊口，并日而食，吟詠《詩》《書》，不改其樂。」唐代杜甫〈送重表姪王砅評事使南海〉：「長者來在門，荒年自糊口。」 「 糊 」表示塗抹、填塞。如清代西周生《醒世姻緣》第40回：「東房裏極乾淨，糊得雪洞似的，現成的床，現成的炕，十個也睡開了。」老舍〈駱駝祥子〉：「一趟車拉下來，灰土被汗合成泥，糊在臉上，只露著眼與嘴三個涷紅了的圈。」
From " m" to " hu" sound. "Said Wen" is made " 𪏻", saying: "𪏻, sticky too. From millet, ancient sound. 䊀, (sticky) [𪏻] or from rice." Duan Yucai's note: "Ully made paste." The original meaning is glued. . Such as "Selected Works. Bao Mingyuan's "Wucheng Fu": "To make magnets for imperial rushing, and to paste the earth to fly text." Li Zhouhan's note: "The soil is also terracotta. The walls are decorated with sticky harmony, so Yunfeiwen." Another example is Bai Juyi in the Tang Dynasty. "Bamboo Window": "Open the window without sticking paper, and planting bamboo is not the way to go." " Paste" also refers to paste. Such as "Qi Min Yao Shu. "Miscellaneous": "Soaking lime in water, after a night, dipping the juice to make the bean paste and making the batter, there will be no insects." Tang Dynasty Feng Zhi's "Miscellaneous Yunxian" volume five cited "Xuanwu Grand Events": "Daily use a bucket for Paste for sealing." " Paste" also means to satisfy one's hunger with porridge, which means to barely maintain a living, the same as " paste." Such as "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "Wang Lie": "The ring blocks the gate, the poor alleys are closed, the rice is eaten by the sun, and the sun is eaten, chanting "Poems" and "Books", without changing his music." Tang Dynasty Du Fu "Send a heavy table to Wang Piao's commentary. Nanhai>: "The elders come at the door, and they make ends meet in famine years." " Paste" means smearing and stuffing. For example, Chapter 40 of "Awakening Marriage" by Xi Zhousheng in the Qing Dynasty: "The east room is very clean, like a snow hole, ready-made beds, ready-made kangs, ten of them are also asleep." Lao She, "Lulu Xiangzi": " Once the car was pulled down, the dust was turned into mud by sweat, and it was glued to the face, showing only three red circles of eyes and mouth."

糊字的基本解释

糊
hū
涂抹或粘合使封闭起来：糊了一层泥。

糊
hú
粘合，涂附：裱糊。糊墙。糊窗户。
粥类：糊口。
〔糊涂〕ａ．不明事理；认识模糊混乱，如“他太糊糊了”；ｂ．内容混乱的，如“糊糊账”。
同“煳”。

糊
hù
像粥一样的食物：面糊。辣椒糊。
欺骗，蒙混，敷衍：糊弄。

糊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hú］
［《廣韻》户吴切，平模，匣。］
(1)同“餬”。稠粥。
(2)涂附；黏合。
(3)同“煳”。食品、衣物等经火变得黄黑发焦。
[②]［hù］［hú］
(1)像稠粥样的物品。
(2)敷衍；弥缝缺失。
(3)欺蒙。
[③]［hū］
用较厚的糊状物涂抹缝子、窟窿或平面。

糊字的英文翻译

◎ 糊
paste, burnt

糊字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【米字部】　糊； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页911第09
【廣韻】戸吳切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】洪孤切，?音胡。【說文】黏也。　又【篇海】煑米及麫爲粥。【宋正考父鼎銘】饘于是，粥于是，以糊余口。　又模糊，漫貌。【杜甫詩】駞背錦模糊。　又【字彙補】許骨切，音忽。【金壷字考】糊塗，音忽突。　【說文】本作?。或作䊀。【集韻】或作?。亦作?、?。又作䉿、?。

糊字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
糊字的起名意思

指涂抹或填补，泛指遮掩。

paste
Basic explanation of words
paste
hū
Smearing or gluing makes it closed: a layer of mud is pasted.
paste
hú
Gluing, coating: pasting. Paste the wall. Paste the windows.
Congee: subsistence.
[Confused] a. Unclear affair; fuzzy understanding, such as "he is too vague"; b. The content is messy, such as "stuffy accounts".
Same as "煳".
paste
hù
Food like porridge: batter. Chili paste.
Deception, confusion, perfunctory: fooling.
paste
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hú］
["Guangyun" Hu Wuqie, flat mold, box. ]
(1) Same as "paste". Thick porridge.
(2) Coating; bonding.
(3) Same as "煳". Food, clothing, etc. become yellow and black and scorched by fire.
[②]［hù］［hú］
(1) Items like thick porridge.
(2) Perfunctory; missing gaps.
(3) Deception.
[③]［hū］
Use a thicker paste to smear seams, holes, or flat surfaces.
paste

[Not set on] [Mi Zi Department] 　糊; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 911 No. 09
[Guang Yun] Jian Wu Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Hong Gu Qi,? Yin Hu. [Said Wen] Sticky also.　[Pianhai] Steamed rice and glutinous rice are congee. [Song Zhengkao's father Dingming] So Xuan, so porridge, to make ends meet.　Vague and sloppy. [Poems of Du Fu] Qian’s back brocade is vague.　[Word Supplement] Xu Guqie, the sound is sudden. 【Examination of Jinhao Characters】Fuzzy, sudden sound.　【Said the text】This work?. Or do it. Old glyph
paste
Name meaning
Refers to smearing or filling, generally refers to covering.
hú, hū, hù
I hù
1) клейстер, клей, паста
面糊 мучной клейстер
2) см. 糊弄
II hú
1) клеить, оклеивать, склеивать
糊一个纸盒子 склеить бумажную коробку
糊门 приклеить к двери
2) вм. 煳 (пригорать, подгорать)
3) кашица, размазня
4) вм. 胡 (безрассудный, сумбурный; как попало, кое-как)
III hū
1) заклеивать, замазывать, залеплять (что-л. чем-л.)
用灰把墙缝糊上 известью заделывать (замазывать) щели (трещины) в стене
糊了一脸泥 замазать (испачкать) всё лицо грязью
2) диал. варить
糊了一大锅白薯 сварить большой котелок сладкого картофеля
